analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
analyzed: jānataḥ ha bhikkhave passataḥ āsavānam khayam vadāmi no a jānataḥ no a passataḥ

original: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato, kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
analyzed: kiñca bhikkhave jānataḥ kim passataḥ āsavānam khayaḥ hoti

original: Idaṁ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti. Ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti,
analyzed: idam dukkhanti bhikkhave jānataḥ passataḥ āsavānam khayaḥ hoti ayam dukkha samudayo ti

original: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti. Ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti, bhikkhave, jānato
analyzed: bhikkhave jānataḥ passataḥ āsavānam khayaḥ hoti ayam dukkha nirodhaḥ ti bhikkhave jānataḥ

original: passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti. Ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti, bhikkhave, jānato
analyzed: passataḥ āsavānam khayaḥ hoti ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ti bhikkhave jānataḥ

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave jānataḥ evam passataḥ āsavānam khayaḥ hoti iti
kha yasmin paṭhamam ña a ṇa

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
